title: Addressing Climate Change With City Leaders Who Are Making a Difference
text: Earlier this week, "Our Cities , Our Climate " brought mayors and city officials from around the world to Washington to discuss the vital role that cities play in leading climate change efforts. As Secretary Kerry emphasized in his remarks at
